products.title: Scandi Birds, Scarlet - Roman Blind
products.description: Perhaps the most mature of the scandi birds range, the scarlet presents its simply shaped birds this time in a deep ruby shade, with a lighter, tonal shade incorporated. The background is a soft oatmeal cream, which provides the ideal canvas for this standout design. Think cosiness and warmth with a contemporary twist in your living room, and encompass the scarlet with matching cream walls and plenty of warm reds throughout the room, using throws, cushions, and wall art to display the rich hues.

products.title: Manila, Cranberry - Roman Blind
products.description: The foliage pattern of the manila cranberry boasts a tropical colour scheme of lime green, jewel purple, and red cerise on a neutral background. The leaves overlap beautifully, making the pattern intricate and pretty. Go for a tropical vibe in your guest bedroom, setting the cranberry against a lime feature wall and accenting throughout the room with bold purple shades. Temper the look with plenty of whites, so as not to overpower the room with too much colour.

products.title: Nordic, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: In vivid mustard yellow and pure white, the nordic in ochre has a distinctly scandinavian feel to it, highlighted by its clean lines and vibrant imagery. The pretty florals and foliage sit boldly against the background, so there's no chance of this blind fading into the background. Liven up your kitchen by opting for a vibrant yellow colour palette. Add varying shades of yellow, including the occasional orange and lime for contrast, and temper the look with white walls or units.

products.title: Heathland, Rouge - Roman Blind
products.description: Welcome a vibrant burst of life into your home by including the artistic and eye-catching print of the heathland rouge. The relaxed and nimble cloth invokes a casual and inspiring mood, whilst the creative foliage design with its unique, rich plum hue adds personality and colour. Create a sophisticated look by including a rich and lavish feature colour, sticking to a classic ivory base to help to enhance the sumptuous shade.

products.title: Flower Power, Scarlet - Roman Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the flower power in scarlet displays an ultra-contemporary floral pattern in reds, oranges, and greys, and the outcome is attractive and eye-catching. The high quality cotton material ensures the fabric hangs beautifully in the neat folds of the roman blind. The scarlet is perfect for the kitchen, with its clean and modern look, and will work wonderfully against white or neutral walls and units, as well as light contemporary wooden furniture.

products.title: Narvik, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Mustard yellow is still bang on trend, so the narvik in ochre offers style in spades. The deep yellow canvas, on a tightly woven cotton fabric, plays host to an array of sweetly drawn birds, flowers, and leaves, bringing a contemporary burst of brightness wherever it goes. Add the ochre to a contemporary grey and mustard living room. White walls will work well, perhaps with a feature wall in stone grey, with primarily grey bases and mustard accessories.

products.title: Skye Lava Red (Blackout)
products.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Faux Suede, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: With the faux suede in red, you're getting more than an attractive, pillarbox red blind; its soft and touchable fabric, with the feel of true suede, provides warmth and cosiness to go with its bold colour, making it hang effortlessly in any snug home. The red's versatility means that it can be used in both modern and traditional homes. Try combining it with pale taupe or dark oatmeal walls for a warm and inviting feel in your living room.

products.description: A classic william morris design in a gorgeous blue colour palette, strawberry thief, is the easiest way to bring the iconic style to your home. Part of their william morris range, in collaboration with the v&a, this design was initially created back in 1883. It was inspired a classic william morris design in a gorgeous blue colour palette, strawberry thief, is the easiest way to bring the iconic style to your home.

products.title: Eaton Embroidered Neutral Roman Blind
products.description: A traditional pattern with lots of contemporary style, this eaton embroidered neutral roman blind is ideal for creating something timeless and beautiful. The embroidered fern leaves are picked out in white threads on a sandy neutral fabric that will blend in with a whole host of a traditional pattern with lots of contemporary style, this eaton embroidered neutral roman blind is ideal for creating something timeless and beautiful.

products.title: Odense, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: With its slightly retro feel, the odense in ochre features an ultra-fashionable yellow and grey colour combination. Mustard yellow is tempered by varying shades of grey, from dark charcoal to barely there dove, and all are displayed on a soft white background. The ochre would make the perfect addition to a home office or study, where you can surround it with plenty of whites, similar greys, and the occasional mustard yellow accent to bring out the hue in the blind.

products.title: Cluck Cluck, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: On a bed of blue slate grey sit white chicken illustrations with lemon yellow, deep navy, and ice blue detailing, and that makes up the cluck cluck ochre. The result is clean and contemporary yet with a certain moodiness that will suit rooms that are naturally light and airy. Sit the ochre amidst palest grey walls or against a lemon yellow feature wall for a light and cheery look in your kitchen or dining area.

products.title: Oh My Deer, Berry - Roman Blind
products.description: The cute cartoon animals of the oh my deer in berry are as fun as the blind's name. The white background is home to deer, rabbits, hedgehogs, and more, all beautifully painted in pretty shades of blue, green, and red. Perhaps your little one would enjoy the berry in their bedroom or playroom, where the sweet illustrations can capture their imagination. Match the colours in the blind throughout the rest of the room, which will give you plenty of freedom given how many hues there are here.

products.title: Bergen, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: The sunny yellow background of the bergen in ochre plays the ideal host to the contemporary floral sketches that adorn it. The grey-blue and white tones of the illustrations work beautifully with the yellow, offsetting it perfectly. Use the ochre to brighten up a kitchen, where the walls are pale yellow and the units are painted a chalky grey. Match utensils, appliances, and ornaments throughout with pretty yellow tones and pale stone greys.

products.title: Lilium, Soft Red - Roman Blind
products.description: In the soft red version of the lilium, the cream background offers just the subtlest tint of yellow, and on it sits large, intricately drawn florals in hushed reds, country greens, and gentle taupes. The luxuriously silky texture of the fabric works perfectly with the shape of the blind, complementing soft with soft. Decorate your dining room with all out elegance by placing the soft red against a matching red feature wall, keeping the remaining walls cream.
